org.casa.synthproxy

Class CommPort

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.casa.synthproxy.CommPort

  • public class CommPort
extends Object
    This class maps a serial communication port that is used to communicate with CASAActuator. It uses JSSC as a library to achieve serial communication.
    Author:
    Daniel Parra Tucunduva

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private String dataBuffer
      Data buffer that will be used to store received data
      private boolean local
      Local communication flag - if it is true, it is a communication issued by this class.
      private SerialPort serialPort
      Serial Port that will be used in communication

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CommPort(String serial)
      Constructor that receives a COM port, opens it and check for a CASAActuator enabled Arduino system

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Close this serial connection
      static CommPort getArduinoCommPort()
      This method will get all COM ports available in the computer and issue a command to try to find a CASAActuator enabled Arduino system.

      Get serial port connection data buffer

      Check if the global switch in CASAActuator is on.

      Set a GLOBAL communication type.

    • Field Detail

      • serialPort

        private SerialPort serialPort
        Serial Port that will be used in communication

      • dataBuffer

        private String dataBuffer
        Data buffer that will be used to store received data

      • local

        private boolean local
        Local communication flag - if it is true, it is a communication issued by this class. If set to false, it is a communication that came from CASAActuator

    • Constructor Detail

      • CommPort

        public CommPort(String serial)
         throws Exception
        Constructor that receives a COM port, opens it and check for a CASAActuator enabled Arduino system
        Parameters:
        serial - Serial por identification (Ex.: COM3)
        Throws:
        Exception - Error opening the port and checking for a CASAActuator enabled Arduino system. If this happens, you can assume that there is no system connected to this port.

    • Method Detail

      • getArduinoCommPort

        public static CommPort getArduinoCommPort()
        This method will get all COM ports available in the computer and issue a command to try to find a CASAActuator enabled Arduino system. If no CASAACtuator system is found, a RuntimeException is throw
        Returns:
        CASAActuator COM port.

      • getSerialPort

        public SerialPort getSerialPort()
        Get the JSSC serial port object
        Returns:
        JSSC serial port object

      • sendCommand

        public void sendCommand(Command command)
                 throws Exception
        Send a command to this Serial port.
        Parameters:
        command - Command to be sent
        Throws:
        Exception - Error writing bytes to the port

      • close

        public void close()
           throws Exception
        Close this serial connection
        Throws:
        Exception - Error closing this serial connection

      • setDataBuffer

        public void setDataBuffer(String data)
        Set serial port connection data buffer
        Parameters:
        data - serial port connection data buffer

      • getDataBuffer

        public String getDataBuffer()
        Get serial port connection data buffer
        Returns:
        serial port connection data buffer

      • setLocalCommunication

        private void setLocalCommunication()
        Set a LOCAL communication type. This flag will tell the system to stop looking for command issued from CASAActuator and handle incoming data as a response.

      • setGlobalCommunication

        private void setGlobalCommunication()
        Set a GLOBAL communication type. This flag will tell the system to handle incoming data as a new command issued from CASAActuator

      • getGlobalSwitchStatus

        public boolean getGlobalSwitchStatus()
                              throws Exception
        Check if the global switch in CASAActuator is on. This method can be used to check if commands can be sent or just to check if the connection with CASAActuator if fine.
        Returns:
        true if connection is OK and CASAActuator is enabled and ready to receive commands, false if connection is OK but the switch is OFF
        Throws:
        Exception - There is no valid connection with CASAActuator

      • serialEvent

        public void serialEvent(SerialPortEvent event)
        This method handles serial communication events, including data receiving.
        Parameters:
        event - Event information. This should contain everything (including data) related to the event issued by communication library (JSSC).
